# Third-party dependencies

This directory contains third-party libraries and submodules.

## FrodoPIR

To add FrodoPIR as a submodule:
```bash
git submodule add https://github.com/brave-experiments/frodo-pir.git frodo-pir
```

Or clone it directly:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/brave-experiments/frodo-pir.git
```
